newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0810 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. Live markets holding but technical resistance and boxed values down.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.150 cent. Carryover demand seen as index continues to climb and corn futures work lower.
LEAN HOGS - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. Evening up ahead of Hogs and Pigs report seen as main influence.
PORK BELLIES - Up 0.200 to off 0.200 cent. Strong cash supportive to nearbys but next year seen down. Also look for evening up ahead of report.
